title: Peabody to Close Coal Mine Amid Price Drop
text:
Peabody Energy Corp said Monday it plans to shutter a mine and coal processing facility in Saline County, Ill. due to “uneconomic mining conditions” as U.S. coal producers continue to face depressed pricing and competitive pressure from other energy sources.

St. Louis, Mo.-based Peabody said roughly 225 workers at the Wildcat Hills Mine and a nearby coal processing plant will potentially be impacted by the scheduled December closure. Workers will be offered separation benefits and outplacement assistance, Peabody said.
